hotels.title: Secluded Santorini Oceanfront Resort Carved into the Cliffs with Panoramic Aegean Views
hotels.description: Get your Greek on with a unique stay at this tranquil, five-star retreat perched high above Santorini's historic caldera wall. Carved into the hillside, this veritable haven offers breathtaking views of the deep blue Aegean Sea, rooms that capture the essence of ancient Greek style and architecture, and the Icons Restaurant & Cocktail Bar to unwind and enjoy the island's natural beauty. Whether you're organising a romantic getaway with a loved one or planning an exceptional holiday with friends, Santorini has plenty of activities to cater to every taste. Enjoy idyllic culinary experiences with seasonal cuisine and local wines, or take a trip to the onsite ICONIC SPA for a touch of wellness during your stay.
